com.riskybusiness.neural

Class StepNeuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskybusiness.neural.Neuron
      • com.riskybusiness.neural.StepNeuron
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Neuron>

    public class StepNeuron
extends Neuron

         A Neuron that uses a step function as its activation function. This step is determined by a threshold and can be set by the programmer.

    Since:
    1.6
    See Also:
    Neuron, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected float threshold
      The value that will determine whether or not the StepNeuron will fire.

      • Fields inherited from class com.riskybusiness.neural.Neuron

        inputs, learningRate, weights

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StepNeuron(float threshold, int inputNum)
      Constructs a StepNeuron with the given threshold to use in the activation function, as well as the amount of inputs for the Neuron.
      StepNeuron(int inputNum)
      Constructs a StepNeuron with the given amount of inputs for the SigmoidNeuron.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float activate(float summation)
      Will fire if the summation variable is greater than the threshold, or it won't.
      void setThreshold(float threshold)
      Changes the threshold of this StepNeuron to the given value.

      • Methods inherited from class com.riskybusiness.neural.Neuron

        addToInput, adjustWeight, adjustWeights, canFire, clearInputs, compareTo, fire, fire, getWeights, hasFired, setLearningRate, setWeights, sum, toString, train, train

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • threshold

        protected float threshold

        The value that will determine whether or not the StepNeuron will fire. It will only fire if the sum found is greater than or equal to the threshold.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StepNeuron

        public StepNeuron(float threshold,
          int inputNum)

        Constructs a StepNeuron with the given threshold to use in the activation function, as well as the amount of inputs for the Neuron.

        Parameters:
        threshold - The number to determine whether to fire or not.
        inputNum - The amount of inputs to this StepNeuron.
        See Also:
        Neuron.Neuron(int)

      • StepNeuron

        public StepNeuron(int inputNum)

        Constructs a StepNeuron with the given amount of inputs for the SigmoidNeuron. The threshold is set to a half.

        Parameters:
        inputNum - The amount of inputs to this step Neuron.
        See Also:
        StepNeuron(float, int)

    • Method Detail

      • setThreshold

        public void setThreshold(float threshold)

        Changes the threshold of this StepNeuron to the given value.

        Parameters:
        threshold - The new threshold.

      • activate

        public float activate(float summation)

        Will fire if the summation variable is greater than the threshold, or it won't.

        Specified by:
        activate in class Neuron
        Parameters:
        summation - The sum of the inputs of the Neuron, which tells the Neuron whether to fire or not.
        Returns:
        1 if the sum was greater or equal to the threshold, 0 otherwise.
